thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 13 of 227
thread.title: DeAndre

author: DeAndre
title: DeAndre
text: Our delivery guys showed up even before the scheduled window for arrival which was great because no one likes sitting all day waiting on a delivery. The workers had great attitudes and asked how my day was, and also reminded me that they delivered to my address when I moved in. I even got a compliment on my basement : ). It's satisfying knowing that you're dealing with a company that provides great customer service.
